title: UsernodeInstallerConfiguration
description: Configuration parameters for the usernode installer.

kind.description: Reference to the kind of JSON document. Always 'UsernodeInstallerConfiguration'.

ip.description: IP address of the management node which the usernode will contact.

domains.description: List of domains served at the IP address given by 'ip'.

certs.description: Key/Value pairs of file name to base64-encoded certificate. Should be placed at /opt/cerebras/certs/.
